name: che-duckdb-mcp
description: Integrated MCP server for DuckDB documentation search and database operations
long_description: A powerful MCP server combining DuckDB documentation search with native database operations. Features 8 documentation tools for searching functions, syntax, and guides, plus 6 database tools for connecting, querying, and managing DuckDB databases. Supports JSON, Markdown, and CSV output formats.

tools.name: get_section
tools.description: Get content of a specific documentation section

tools.name: get_function_docs
tools.description: Get documentation for a specific DuckDB function

tools.name: get_sql_syntax
tools.description: Get SQL syntax documentation for a statement type

tools.name: get_doc_info
tools.description: Get information about the loaded documentation

tools.name: db_connect
tools.description: Connect to a DuckDB database file or in-memory database

tools.name: db_query
tools.description: Execute SELECT queries on the connected database

tools.name: db_execute
tools.description: Execute DDL/DML statements (CREATE, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE)

tools.name: db_list_tables
tools.description: List all tables and views in the database

tools.name: db_describe
tools.description: Describe table structure or query result schema

tools.name: db_info
tools.description: Get information about the current database connection
